text: The term statutory rape means sexual activity with a minor that is not forced. It usually refers to when adults engage in sex with someone below the age of consent. ==Situation== In 95% of the cases, the victim is female. Very few jurisdictions actually use the term statutory rape. ==Alternative words== Words such as unlawful sex with a minor or unlawful carnal knowledge are used. ==References== Category:Sex crimes
title: Statutory rape
